description.en: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.
description.ar: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.
description.br: Shade é um poderoso deus do medo e da ira, e concede este buff aos jogadores, imbuindo-os com uma rajada de vento que aprimora seus reflexos e permite que se movam mais rápido.
description.cn: 幻魔依普利是一位备受尊崇的冷漠与中立之神，他们通过向玩家注入一股生命能量来赋予玩家这个增益效果，这股生命能量会增加玩家的最大生命值，使他们能够承受更多的伤害。
description.cns: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.
description.de: Shade ist ein mächtiger Gott der Angst und des Zorns, der den Spielern diesen Stärkungszauber verleiht, indem er sie mit einem Windstoß ausstattet, der ihre Reflexe verbessert und sie schneller laufen lässt.
description.fi: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.
description.fil: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.
description.fr: Shade est un puissant dieu de la peur et de la rage, et il accorde cet avantage aux joueurs en les imprégnant d'une bourrasque de vent qui améliore leurs réflexes et leur permet de se déplacer plus rapidement.
description.id: Shade adalah dewa ketakutan dan kemarahan yang kuat, dan mereka memberikan buff ini kepada pemain dengan memberi mereka hembusan angin yang meningkatkan refleks mereka dan memungkinkan mereka bergerak lebih cepat.
description.it: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.
description.jp: シェイドは恐怖と怒りの強力な神であり、反射神経を高め、より速く移動できるようにする突風をプレイヤーに吹き込むことで、このバフをプレイヤーに与えます。
description.kr: 쉐이드는 공포와 분노의 강력한 신입니다. 플레이어에게 돌풍을 불어넣어 반사 신경과 이동 속도를 강화하는 버프를 부여합니다.
description.nl: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.
description.pl: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.
description.ru: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.
description.sp: Shade es un poderoso dios del miedo y la rabia, y otorga esta ventaja a los jugadores imbuyéndolos de una ráfaga de viento que mejora sus reflejos y les permite moverse más rápido.
description.sw: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.
description.th: Shade เป็นเทพแห่งความกลัวและความโกรธ และพวกมันจะมอบบัฟนี้ให้กับผู้เล่นด้วยการมอบลมพัดพาซึ่งจะช่วยเพิ่มการตอบสนองของผู้เล่นและทำให้พวกเขาเคลื่อนไหวได้เร็วขึ้น
description.tw: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.
description.vi: Shade là một vị thần mạnh mẽ của sự sợ hãi và thịnh nộ, và họ ban sức mạnh này cho người chơi bằng cách truyền cho họ một luồng gió giúp tăng cường phản xạ và cho phép họ di chuyển nhanh hơn.

name.jp: イブリスの不屈の精神

description.en: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.
description.ar: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.
description.br: Iblis é um reverenciado deus da apatia e neutralidade, e concede este buff aos jogadores, infundindo-os com uma explosão de energia vital que aumenta a saúde máxima e permite suportar mais danos.
description.cn: 波布尔是一位传奇的欢乐与纯洁之神，他们通过创造一个强大的护盾来赋予玩家这个增益效果，该护盾为玩家提供了抵御敌人攻击的额外一层防护。
description.cns: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.
description.de: Iblis ist ein verehrter Gott der Apathie und Neutralität, der den Spielern diesen Buff gewährt, indem er sie mit einem Schub an Lebensenergie versorgt, der ihre maximale Gesundheit erhöht und sie in die Lage versetzt, mehr Schaden zu ertragen.
description.fi: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.
description.fil: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.
description.fr: Iblis est un dieu vénéré de l'apathie et de la neutralité, et il accorde ce buff aux joueurs en leur insufflant une bouffée d'énergie vitale qui augmente leur santé maximale et leur permet d'encaisser plus de dégâts.
description.id: Iblis adalah dewa sikap apatis dan netral yang dihormati, dan mereka memberikan buff ini kepada pemain dengan memberi mereka ledakan energi kehidupan yang meningkatkan max HP dan memungkinkan mereka menahan lebih banyak damage.
description.it: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.
description.jp: イブリスは無関心と中立の崇拝された神であり、最大体力を増やし、より多くのダメージに耐えられるようにする生命エネルギーのバーストをプレイヤーに注入することで、このバフをプレイヤーに与えます。
description.kr: 이블리스는 무관심과 중립의 존경받는 신입니다. 엄청난 힘으로 플레이어의 최대 생명력을 끌어올려 공격을 더 오래 버틸 수 있는 버프를 부여합니다.
description.nl: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.
description.pl: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.
description.ru: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.
description.sp: Iblis es un dios venerado de la apatía y la neutralidad, y otorga esta ventaja a los jugadores infundiéndoles una explosión de energía vital que aumenta su salud máxima y les permite resistir más daño.
description.sw: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.
description.th: Iblis เป็นเทพแห่งความเฉยเมยและความเป็นกลาง และมอบบัฟนี้ให้กับผู้เล่นด้วยการเติมพลังชีวิตที่จะเพิ่มพลังชีวิตสูงสุดให้กับพวกเขา และทำให้พวกเขาสามารถทนทานต่อความเสียหายได้มากขึ้น
description.tw: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.
description.vi: Iblis là vị thần tôn nghiêm của sự lãnh đạm và trung lập, Người tăng sức mạnh này cho người chơi bằng cách truyền cho họ một nguồn năng lượng bùng nổ, giúp tăng sinh lực tối đa và cho phép người chơi chịu được nhiều sát thương hơn.

description.en: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.
description.ar: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.
description.br: Bubble é um lendário deus da alegria e pureza, e concede este buff aos jogadores, criando um poderoso escudo que proporciona uma camada extra de defesa contra ataques inimigos.
description.cn: 谢莉德是一位强大的恐惧与愤怒之神，他们通过向玩家灌输一阵狂风来赋予玩家这个增益效果，这阵风能够增强玩家的反应能力，让他们移动得更快。
description.cns: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.
description.de: Bubble ist ein legendärer Gott der Freude und der Reinheit. Er verleiht den Spielern diesen Buff, indem er einen mächtigen Schild erschafft, der eine zusätzliche Verteidigungsschicht gegen feindliche Angriffe bietet.
description.fi: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.
description.fil: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.
description.fr: Bubble est un dieu légendaire de la joie et de la pureté, et il accorde cet avantage aux joueurs en créant un puissant bouclier qui fournit une couche supplémentaire de défense contre les attaques ennemies.
description.id: Bubble adalah dewa kegembiraan dan kemurnian yang legendaris, dan mereka memberikan buff ini kepada pemain dengan menciptakan perisai kuat yang memberikan lapisan pertahanan ekstra terhadap serangan musuh.
description.it: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.
description.jp: バブルは喜びと純粋さの伝説の神であり、敵の攻撃に対する防御層を追加する強力なシールドを作成することで、プレイヤーにこのバフを付与します。
description.kr: 버블은 기쁨과 순수의 전설적인 신입니다. 플레이어에게 강력한 방패를 생성하여 적 공격을 막아주는 추가 방어 버프를 부여합니다.
description.nl: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.
description.pl: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.
description.ru: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.
description.sp: Burbuja es un dios legendario de la alegría y la pureza, y otorga este beneficio a los jugadores al crear un poderoso escudo que es una capa adicional de defensa contra los ataques enemigos.
description.sw: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.
description.th: Bubble เป็นเทพเจ้าแห่งความสุขและความบริสุทธิ์ เขาจะมอบบัฟนี้ให้กับผู้เล่นด้วยการสร้างโล่อันแข็งแกร่งที่ให้การป้องกันชั้นพิเศษต่อการโจมตีของศัตรู
description.tw: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.
description.vi: Bubble là một vị thần huyền thoại của niềm vui và sự thuần khiết, Người ban tặng năng lực này cho người chơi bằng cách tạo ra một tấm khiên mạnh mẽ, giúp họ có thêm một lớp phòng thủ chống lại đòn tấn công của kẻ thù.

name.jp: プレイパークローンチバフ

description.en: Enjoy increased Experience and Drops up to Level 119!
description.ar: Enjoy increased Experience and Drops up to Level 119!
description.br: Aproveite experiência e drops aumentados até o nível 119!
description.cn: 享受经验值提升和物品掉落率提升，该效果可持续至 119 级！
description.cns: Enjoy increased Experience and Drops up to Level 119!
description.de: Genieße mehr Erfahrung und Drops bis zu Level 119!
description.fi: Enjoy increased Experience and Drops up to Level 119!
description.fil: Enjoy increased Experience and Drops up to Level 119!
description.fr: Appréciez de l'expérience et un butin accru jusqu'au niveau 119 !
description.id: Nikmati peningkatan EXP dan DROP hingga Level 119!
description.it: Enjoy increased Experience and Drops up to Level 119!

description.en: Damages surrounding enemies with a sandstorm. Chance to reduce Accuracy.
description.ar: Damages surrounding enemies with a sandstorm. Chance to reduce Accuracy.
description.br: Conjura uma tempestade de areia, causando dano e tendo chance de reduzir a Precisão dos alvos.
description.cn: 风与土形成的沙尘暴，令其中的目标受到剧烈攻击。有几率降低目标命中。
description.cns: 风与土形成的沙尘暴，令其中的目标受到剧烈攻击。有几率降低目标命中。
description.de: Mehreren Gegnern durch Herbeirufen eines Sandsturms Schaden zufügen. Kleine Chance die Genauigkeit zu verringern.
description.fi: Damages surrounding enemies with a sandstorm. Chance to reduce Accuracy.
description.fil: Damages surrounding enemies with a sandstorm. Chance to reduce Accuracy.
description.fr: Invoque une tempête de sable qui s'abat sur tous les ennemis de la zone et a une chance de réduire leur Précision.
description.id: Menyerang musuh sekitar dengan badai pasir serta mengurangi Accuracy mereka.
description.it: Damages surrounding enemies with a sandstorm. Chance to reduce Accuracy.
description.jp: 砂嵐を発生させて、周囲の敵に地と風の攻撃を行います。
description.kr: 거친 모래 폭풍을 일으켜 주변의 모든 적을 공격합니다. 일정 확률로 대상의 적중률을 감소 시킵니다.
description.nl: Damages surrounding enemies with a sandstorm. Chance to reduce Accuracy.
description.pl: Atakuje wszystkich wrogów wokół ciebie za pomocą Burzy Piaskowej. Celność wrogów mocno spadnie.
description.ru: На врагов обрушивается песчаная буря с некоторым шансом понизить меткость.
description.sp: Daña a los enemigos de alrededor con una tormenta de arena. Puede reducir su Precisión.
description.sw: Damages surrounding enemies with a sandstorm. Chance to reduce Accuracy.
description.th: โจมตีเป้าหมายรอบๆด้วยพายุทราย โอกาสในการลดความแม่นยำ
description.tw: 引發沙塵風暴，讓周圍所有的敵人受到風與地屬性的攻擊，有機會減少敵人命中率
description.vi: Gây sát thương xung quanh kẻ địch bằng bão cát. Cơ hội giảm độ chính xác

description.en: A continuous spinning attack.
description.ar: A continuous spinning attack.
description.br: Um ataque giratório contínuo.
description.cn: 循环技能，高速旋转自己的身体，利用转动时产生的离心力连续攻击对方。
description.cns: 循环技能，高速旋转自己的身体，利用转动时产生的离心力连续攻击对方。
description.de: Ein Kreiselskill, um den Feind mehrmals schnell hintereinander zu treffen.
description.fi: Jatkuva pyörivä hyökkäys.
description.fil: Tuloy-tuloy na umiikot na atake.
description.fr: Attaque circulaire qui frappe l'ennemi à trois reprises.
description.id: Serangan berputar terus menerus.
description.it: Un attacco circolare che colpisce l'avversario tre volte.
description.jp: マーシナリー・サークルスキルで、身体を回転させながら、相手を切り刻むように攻撃します。
description.kr: 서클스킬로 몸을 급속으로 회전하며 상대를 연속 타격합니다.
description.nl: A continuous spinning attack.
description.pl: Tnie przeciwnika wielokrotnie, poprzez wirowanie wokół własnej osi.
description.ru: Продолжительная круговая атака.
description.sp: Ataque giratorio continuo.
description.sw: A continuous spinning attack.
description.th: แกว่งอาวุธไปรอบตัวและโจมตีต่อเนื่อง 3 ครั้งติดกัน
description.tw: 急速旋轉身體並在空中施展迴旋斬來攻擊目標
description.vi: Một cuộc tấn công quay liên tục.

description.en: Enemies take damage over time in an area around you.
description.ar: Enemies take damage over time in an area around you.
description.br: Canaliza uma marca em uma área ao seu redor, causando danos contínuos aos inimigos que pisarem nela.
description.cn: 在圣之光照射下形成具有圣力的领域，打击踏入领域的敌人。
description.cns: 在圣之光照射下形成具有圣力的领域，打击踏入领域的敌人。
description.de: Zieht einen heiligen Bereich um dich. Gegner erleiden in diesem Bereich Schaden.
description.fi: Enemies take damage over time in an area around you.
description.fil: Enemies take damage over time in an area around you.
description.fr: Attaque ancestrale qui inflige des dégâts à répétition à tous les ennemis situés à proximité du Prêtre.

description.it: Enemies take damage over time in an area around you.
description.jp: 一定範囲内に神聖な結界を張り、そこに進入した敵に対して持続的ダメージを与えます。

description.nl: Increases fighting cababilities at the cost of 1% of your maximum FP each strike. Damage will increase by 10% of your maximum FP. Requires a one-handed weapon.

description.cns: 发出带有沉默效果的箭，使其无法使用魔法。
description.de: Der Gegner wird daran gehindert, einen Zauberspruch zu vollenden.
description.fi: Attacks the enemy and prevents them from casting spells.
description.fil: Attacks the enemy and prevents them from casting spells.
description.fr: Décoche une flèche destructrice, infligeant de lourds dommages et empêchant l'ennemi d'utiliser ses compétences pendant un certain temps.
description.id: Menyerang musuh dan mencegah mereka merapal mantra.
description.it: Attacks the enemy and prevents them from casting spells.
description.jp: 強力なダメージを与えると共に、一定確率で沈黙状態(魔法が使用できない)にする。
description.kr: 마법 주문을 외울 수 없도록 적을 화살로 공격합니다. 이때 적은 일정 확률로 침묵 상태가 됩니다.
description.nl: Attacks the enemy and prevents them from casting spells.
description.pl: Atakuje wroga i uniemożliwia mu rzucanie zaklęć.
description.ru: Глушащая стрела не дает противнику читать заклинания.
description.sp: Tiro que deshabilita la magia al enemigo.
description.sw: Attacks the enemy and prevents them from casting spells.
description.th: เล็งธนูไปยังลำคอของเป้าหมาย เป้าหมายจะมีโอกาสติดสถานเป็นใบ้
description.tw: 攻擊敵人，並且追加沉默的效果（消耗MP的技能將無法使用）
description.vi: Tấn công kẻ địch và ngăn chúng sử dụng phép thuật.

description.en: This ability draws upon the inner strength of the user & nearby party members, increasing both Attack Power and Attack Speed for a limited time.
description.ar: This ability draws upon the inner strength of the user & nearby party members, increasing both Attack Power and Attack Speed for a limited time.
description.br: Essa habilidade se baseia na força interna do usuário e dos membros de grupo próximos, aumentando o Poder de Ataque e a Velocidade de Ataque por um tempo limitado.
description.cn: 吟唱战歌，提高周围同伴的攻击力和攻击速度。
description.cns: 吟唱战歌，提高周围同伴的攻击力和攻击速度。
description.de: Verbessern der Fähigkeiten im Kampf für die Partymitglieder in deiner Nähe.
description.fi: Käyttäjän ja läheisten ryhmän jäsenten sisäinen voima kasvattaa Hyökkäysvoimaa sekä Hyökkäsnopeutta rajoitetun ajan.
description.fil: This ability draws upon the inner strength of the user & nearby party members, increasing both Attack Power and Attack Speed for a limited time.
description.fr: Cristallise la volonté de tous les membres du groupe proches du Prêtre et augmente leur puissance d'attaque et leur vitesse d'attaque.
description.id: Kemampuan ini memanfaatkan kekuatan batin pengguna & anggota party terdekat, meningkatkan Kekuatan Serangan dan Kecepatan Serangan untuk waktu yang terbatas.
description.it: This ability draws upon the inner strength of the user & nearby party members, increasing both Attack Power and Attack Speed for a limited time.
description.jp: 勇壮な歌で一定範囲のパーティーメンバーの闘志を奮い立たせ、一定時間、追加ダメージを発生させ、攻撃速度を上昇させます。
description.kr: 가까이 있는 극단원들의 전투능력을 향상시킵니다. 추가 데미지와 공격 속도에 영향을 줍니다.
description.nl: This ability draws upon the inner strength of the user & nearby party members, increasing both Attack Power and Attack Speed for a limited time.
description.pl: Przebudza ukrytą siłę, zwiększając szybkość i siłę ataku członków drużyny wokół ciebie.
description.ru: Эта песнь призывает соратников бить яростнее и быстрее. Временно повышает силу и скорость атак.
description.sp: Esta habilidad se basa en la fuerza interior del usuario y de los miembros de party cercanos, lo que aumenta tanto el Poder de Ataque como la Velocidad de Ataque durante un tiempo limitado.
description.sw: This ability draws upon the inner strength of the user & nearby party members, increasing both Attack Power and Attack Speed for a limited time.
description.th: เพิ่มความรวดเร็วและแม่นยำให้กับผู้ใช้และสมาชิกที่อยู่ใกล้ๆ
description.tw: 吟唱戰歌，提升自身周遭的隊友攻擊力和攻擊速度
description.vi: Kỹ năng này dựa vào sức mạnh bên trong của người chơi và các thành viên xung quanh, tăng cả Sức mạnh Công kích và Tốc độ Đánh trong một thời gian giới hạn.

name.jp: アッサルラアルライクム

description.en: Fully concentrated strike. Always Consumes 100% MP.
description.ar: Fully concentrated strike. Always Consumes 100% MP.

description.de: Den Gegner mit voller Konzentration angreifen. Der MP verbrauch liegt bei 100%
description.fi: Fully concentrated strike. Always Consumes 100% MP.

description.it: Fully concentrated strike. Always Consumes 100% MP.

description.ru: Могучий удар, требующий абсолютной сосредоточенности. Отнимает всю ману без остатка.

description.vi: 1 đòn đánh tập trung hoàn toàn. Luôn luôn tiêu hao 100% MP.

description.en: Surprise attack while in Dark Illusion.
description.ar: Surprise attack while in Dark Illusion.
description.br: Um ataque surpresa enquanto estiver usando a Ilusão Sombria.
description.cn: 从潜行状态下现身，给予对方致命一击，有一定几率造成双倍伤害。
description.cns: 从潜行状态下现身，给予对方致命一击，有一定几率造成双倍伤害。

description.fi: Surprise attack while in Dark Illusion.
description.fil: Surprise attack while in Dark Illusion.
description.fr: Attaque ultime qui libère un coup critique d'une rare violence sous l'effet de l'Illusion des ténèbres.

description.it: Surprise attack while in Dark Illusion.
description.jp: ダークイリュージョンの状態でのみ使用でき、相手に不意打ちで攻撃を与えるスキル。
description.kr: 어둠 속에서 순간 모습을 드러내 전력을 다해 적을 기습합니다. 다크일루젼 상태에서만 사용 가능합니다.

description.tw: 在幻影術的狀態之下才可使用，有機率造成爆擊傷害
description.vi: Tấn công đột ngột trong khi đang ở trong Dark Illusion

description.vi: Bắn ba mũi tên cùng một lúc. Làm choáng mục tiêu.

description.en: Become immune to crowd control at the cost of losing your ability to cast skills, and increased incoming healing.
description.ar: Become immune to crowd control at the cost of losing your ability to cast skills, and increased incoming healing.
description.br: Aumenta todas as capacidades de curas recebidas e adquire imunidade a efeitos de controle de grupo, em troca da incapacidade de conjurar habilidades.
description.cn: 传承暴力技师英雄叙里的意志：免疫群体控制并提升即将到来的治疗量，代价是无法使用技能。
description.cns: 传承暴力技师英雄叙里的意志：免疫群体控制并提升即将到来的治疗量，代价是无法使用技能。
description.de: Werde immun gegen Crowd Control, verliere dafür aber die Fähigkeit, Fertigkeiten zu wirken, und erhalte mehr Heilung.
description.fi: Become immune to crowd control at the cost of losing your ability to cast skills, and increased incoming healing.
description.fil: Become immune to crowd control at the cost of losing your ability to cast skills, and increased incoming healing.
description.fr: Vous rend insensible aux effets négatifs et augmente vos soins reçus, mais vous empêche d'utiliser des compétences.
description.id: Menjadi kebal terhadap kontrol kerumunan dengan mengorbankan kemampuan Anda untuk mengeluarkan keterampilan, dan meningkatkan penyembuhan yang masuk.
description.it: Become immune to crowd control at the cost of losing your ability to cast skills, and increased incoming healing.
description.jp: スキルを唱える能力を失い、入ってくる回復を増やすという犠牲を払って、群衆の制御に免疫を取ります。
description.kr: 스킬 시전이 봉인되지만 군중 제어에 면역력이 생기며, 받는 치유량도 증가합니다.
description.nl: Become immune to crowd control at the cost of losing your ability to cast skills, and increased incoming healing.
description.pl: Become immune to crowd control at the cost of losing your ability to cast skills, and increased incoming healing.
description.ru: Become immune to crowd control at the cost of losing your ability to cast skills, and increased incoming healing.
description.sp: Vuélvete inmune al control de masas a costa de perder tu capacidad de lanzar habilidades y aumentar la curación entrante.
description.sw: Become immune to crowd control at the cost of losing your ability to cast skills, and increased incoming healing.
description.th: ไม่ได้รับผลจาก crowd control แต่แลกมาด้วยที่ไม่สามารถใช้ Skill อะไรได้ และเพิ่มผลของการฮีลที่เข้ามา
description.tw: Become immune to crowd control at the cost of losing your ability to cast skills, and increased incoming healing.
description.vi: Trở nên miễn nhiễm với sự kiểm soát của đám đông với cái giá là mất khả năng sử dụng kỹ năng và tăng khả năng hồi máu.

name.jp: レンディングエントリ

description.en: Teleport to your cursor click position, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Chance to slow the enemy. If an enemy dies to this attack, Rending Entry's cooldown is reset.
description.ar: Teleport to your cursor click position, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Chance to slow the enemy. If an enemy dies to this attack, Rending Entry's cooldown is reset.
description.br: Teletransporta para a posição do clique do cursor, causando dano aos inimigos próximos. Se um inimigo morrer por este ataque, o tempo de recarga de Entrada Dilacerante é redefinido.
description.cn: 传送到鼠标点击的位置，并对目的地附近敌人造成伤害，有几率使其减速。如果敌人死于该技能，冷却时间会被重置。
description.cns: 传送到鼠标点击的位置，并对目的地附近敌人造成伤害，有几率使其减速。如果敌人死于该技能，冷却时间会被重置。
description.de: Teleportiere dich an die Position, auf die du mit dem Cursor klickst, und füge Feinden in der Nähe Schaden zu. Chance, den Feind zu verlangsamen. Wenn ein Feind durch diesen Angriff stirbt, wird die Abklingzeit von "Zerreißender Einbruch" zurückgesetzt.
description.fi: Teleport to your cursor click position, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Chance to slow the enemy. If an enemy dies to this attack, Rending Entry's cooldown is reset.
description.fil: Teleport to your cursor click position, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Chance to slow the enemy. If an enemy dies to this attack, Rending Entry's cooldown is reset.
description.fr: Vous téléporte à la position de votre curseur, et inflige des dégâts aux ennemis alentour avec une chance de les ralentir. Si un ennemi meurt par l'effet de cette compétence, elle se recharge immédiatement.
description.id: Teleport ke posisi klik kursor, memberikan damage pada musuh terdekat. Ada kesempatan memberikan status slow kepada musuh, jika musuh mati oleh serangan ini, cooldown Rending Entry akan direset.
description.it: Teleport to your cursor click position, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Chance to slow the enemy. If an enemy dies to this attack, Rending Entry's cooldown is reset.
description.jp: カーソルクリック位置にテレポートし、近くの敵にダメージを与えます。この攻撃で敵が死亡した場合、レンディングエントリーのクールダウンはリセットされます。
description.kr: 클릭한 위치로 텔레포트하여 주변의 적에게 대미지를 줍니다. 일정 확률로 적의 속도를 늦춥니다. 이 공격으로 적을 처치하면 거친 등장의 재사용 대기시간이 초기화됩니다.
description.nl: Teleport to your cursor click position, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Chance to slow the enemy. If an enemy dies to this attack, Rending Entry's cooldown is reset.
description.pl: Teleport to your cursor click position, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Chance to slow the enemy. If an enemy dies to this attack, Rending Entry's cooldown is reset.
description.ru: Teleport to your cursor click position, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Chance to slow the enemy. If an enemy dies to this attack, Rending Entry's cooldown is reset.
description.sp: Teletransportate a la posición de clic del cursor, causando daño a los enemigos cercanos. Posibilidad de ralentizar al enemigo. Si un enemigo muere a causa de este ataque, el tiempo de reutilización de Rending Entry se reinicia.
description.sw: Teleport to your cursor click position, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Chance to slow the enemy. If an enemy dies to this attack, Rending Entry's cooldown is reset.
description.th: เทเลพอร์ตตัวคุณไปยังตำแหน่งที่เลือก สร้างความเสียหายให้กับศัตรูรอบ ๆ มีโอกาสที่จะ Slow ศัตรู ถ้าศัตรูตายเพราะการจู่โจมนี้ Rending Entry คูลดาวน์จะถูกรีเซ็ต
description.tw: Teleport to your cursor click position, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Chance to slow the enemy. If an enemy dies to this attack, Rending Entry's cooldown is reset.
description.vi: Dịch chuyển tức thời đến vị trí nhấp chuột của con trỏ, gây sát thương cho kẻ thù ở gần. Cơ hội để làm chậm kẻ thù. Nếu kẻ thù chết vì đòn tấn công này, thời gian hồi chiêu cho Rending Entry sẽ được đặt lại.

description.en: Summon a tornado around yourself, pushing back nearby enemies and creating a barrier which blocks people from reaching you.
description.ar: Summon a tornado around yourself, pushing back nearby enemies and creating a barrier which blocks people from reaching you.
description.br: Invoca um tornado ao seu redor, empurrando inimigos próximos e criando uma barreira que impede aproximações.
description.cn: 在人物周围召唤出一个龙卷风，击退附近敌人并阻挡想要靠近的敌人。
description.cns: 在人物周围召唤出一个龙卷风，击退附近敌人并阻挡想要靠近的敌人。
description.de: Beschwöre einen Tornado um dich herum, der Feinde in der Nähe zurückdrängt und eine Barriere bildet, die verhindert, dass dich jemand erreicht.
description.fi: Summon a tornado around yourself, pushing back nearby enemies and creating a barrier which blocks people from reaching you.
description.fil: Summon a tornado around yourself, pushing back nearby enemies and creating a barrier which blocks people from reaching you.
description.fr: Invoque une tornade autour de vous, repoussant les ennemis proches et créant un bouclier qui empêche les gens de vous atteindre.
description.id: Panggil tornado di sekitar Anda, mendorong musuh di sekitar dan menciptakan penghalang yang menghalangi orang untuk mencapai Anda.
description.it: Summon a tornado around yourself, pushing back nearby enemies and creating a barrier which blocks people from reaching you.
description.jp: 自分の周りに竜巻を召喚し、近くの敵を押し戻し、人々があなたに到達するのを妨げる障壁を作成します。
description.kr: 주위에 회오리를 소환하여, 주변의 적을 밀어내고 아무도 접근할 수 없게 보호막을 생성합니다.
description.nl: Summon a tornado around yourself, pushing back nearby enemies and creating a barrier which blocks people from reaching you.
description.pl: Summon a tornado around yourself, pushing back nearby enemies and creating a barrier which blocks people from reaching you.
description.ru: Summon a tornado around yourself, pushing back nearby enemies and creating a barrier which blocks people from reaching you.
description.sp: Invoca un tornado a tu alrededor, haciendo retroceder a los enemigos cercanos y creando una barrera que impide que te alcancen.
description.sw: Summon a tornado around yourself, pushing back nearby enemies and creating a barrier which blocks people from reaching you.
description.th: เรียกพายุหมุนมารอบตัวเอง ผลักศัตรูท่อยู่ใกล้ ๆ ออกไป และสร้างบาเรียเพื่อไม่ให้คนอื่นเข้ามาถึงตัวคุณได้
description.tw: Summon a tornado around yourself, pushing back nearby enemies and creating a barrier which blocks people from reaching you.
description.vi: Triệu tập một cơn lốc xoáy xung quanh bạn, đẩy lùi kẻ thù ở gần và tạo ra một rào cản ngăn mọi người tiếp cận bạn.

name.jp: ジェスターズブラスト

description.en: Plant a time bomb on the target, exploding after a few seconds and dealing damage to nearby enemies. If Jester's Blast is recasted on the same target, it will prompt an early detonation for reduced damage and range.
description.ar: Plant a time bomb on the target, exploding after a few seconds and dealing damage to nearby enemies. If Jester's Blast is recasted on the same target, it will prompt an early detonation for reduced damage and range.
description.br: Coloca uma bomba de contagem regressiva no alvo, que detonará após alguns segundos e causará dano a inimigos próximos.
description.cn: 在目标身上放置一个定时炸弹，在几秒后内爆炸并对附近的敌人造成伤害。
description.cns: 在目标身上放置一个定时炸弹，在几秒后内爆炸并对附近的敌人造成伤害。
description.de: Platziere eine Zeitbombe auf dem Ziel, die nach ein paar Sekunden explodiert und den Gegnern in der Nähe Schaden zufügt.
description.fi: Plant a time bomb on the target, exploding after a few seconds and dealing damage to nearby enemies. If Jester's Blast is recasted on the same target, it will prompt an early detonation for reduced damage and range.
description.fil: Plant a time bomb on the target, exploding after a few seconds and dealing damage to nearby enemies. If Jester's Blast is recasted on the same target, it will prompt an early detonation for reduced damage and range.
description.fr: Cache une bombe à retardement sur la cible, qui explose après quelques secondes en infligeant des dégâts aux ennemis proches.
description.id: Tanam bom waktu pada target, meledak setelah beberapa detik dan memberikan kerusakan pada musuh terdekat.
description.it: Plant a time bomb on the target, exploding after a few seconds and dealing damage to nearby enemies. If Jester's Blast is recasted on the same target, it will prompt an early detonation for reduced damage and range.
description.jp: ターゲットに時限爆弾を仕掛け、数秒後に爆発し、近くの敵にダメージを与えます。
description.kr: 대상에게 몇 초 후 폭발하는 시한폭탄을 설치해, 주변의 적에게 대미지를 줍니다.

description.sp: Coloca una bomba de relojería en el objetivo, que explota al cabo de unos segundos e inflige daño a los enemigos cercanos.
description.sw: Plant a time bomb on the target, exploding after a few seconds and dealing damage to nearby enemies. If Jester's Blast is recasted on the same target, it will prompt an early detonation for reduced damage and range.
description.th: ฝังระเบิดเวลาเข้าที่เป้าหมาย ระเบิดหลังจากผ่านไปไม่กี่วินาที และทำความเสียหายให้กับศัตรูรอบ ๆ

description.vi: Đặt một quả bom hẹn giờ vào mục tiêu, phát nổ sau vài giây và gây sát thương cho kẻ địch xung quanh.

description.en: Redirect damage taken from a target player to yourself.
description.ar: Redirect damage taken from a target player to yourself.
description.br: Redireciona o dano recebido por um jogador alvo para si mesmo.
description.cn: 将目标玩家受到的部分伤害将转移到自身。
description.cns: 将目标玩家受到的部分伤害将转移到自身。
description.de: Leite den von einem Zielspieler erlittenen Schaden auf dich selbst um.
description.fi: Redirect damage taken from a target player to yourself.
description.fil: Redirect damage taken from a target player to yourself.
description.fr: Redirige vers vous les dégâts reçus par un joueur ciblé.
description.id: Alihkan kerusakan yang diambil dari pemain target ke diri Anda sendiri.
description.it: Redirect damage taken from a target player to yourself.
description.jp: ターゲットプレイヤーから受けたダメージを自分にリダイレクトします。
description.kr: 대상 플레이어가 받은 대미지가 플레이어에게 돌아옵니다.

description.vi: Chuyển hướng sát thương nhận được từ người chơi mục tiêu sang chính bạn.

description.en: Creates a gravity well at your cursor position that considerably slows enemies in the area.
description.ar: Creates a gravity well at your cursor position that considerably slows enemies in the area.
description.br: Cria um poço gravitacional na posição do cursor que consideravelmente reduz a velocidade dos inimigos na área.

description.de: Erzeugt an der Position des Mauszeigers eine Schwerkraft-Quelle, die Feinde in diesem Bereich erheblich verlangsamt.

description.it: Creates a gravity well at your cursor position that considerably slows enemies in the area.
description.jp: カーソル位置にグラビティウェルを生成し、エリア内の敵の速度を大幅に低下させます。
description.kr: 커서 위치에 중력 우물을 생성하여, 범위 내 적의 이동 속도를 현저히 낮춥니다.

description.th: สร้าง Gravity Well ที่ตำแหน่งของเคอเซอร์ และลดความเร็วของศัตรูในบริเวณนั้นอย่างมาก

description.vi: Tạo ra một giếng trọng lực ở vị trí con trỏ của bạn làm chậm đáng kể kẻ thù trong khu vực.

description.en: Long range shot that sends a shockwave in an area around the target. This attack knocks enemies around the affected target down.
description.ar: Long range shot that sends a shockwave in an area around the target. This attack knocks enemies around the affected target down.
description.br: Ataque de longo alcance que envia uma onda de choque em uma área ao redor do alvo. Este ataque derruba inimigos ao redor do alvo afetado.
description.cn: 远距离射击，向目标周围区域发出冲击波并将敌人击飞。
description.cns: 远距离射击，向目标周围区域发出冲击波并将敌人击飞。
description.de: Weitreichender Schuss, der eine Schockwelle in einem Gebiet um das Ziel herum aussendet. Dieser Angriff wirft Feinde um das betroffene Ziel herum zu Boden.
description.fi: Long range shot that sends a shockwave in an area around the target. This attack knocks enemies around the affected target down.
description.fil: Long range shot that sends a shockwave in an area around the target. This attack knocks enemies around the affected target down.
description.fr: Un coup à distance qui envoie une onde de choc dans une zone autour de la cible. Cette attaque assomme les ennemis autour de la cible.
description.id: Tembakan jarak jauh yang mengirimkan gelombang kejut di area sekitar target. Serangan ini menjatuhkan musuh di sekitar target yang terpengaruh.
description.it: Long range shot that sends a shockwave in an area around the target. This attack knocks enemies around the affected target down.
description.jp: ターゲットの周囲に衝撃波を送る長距離ショット。この攻撃は、影響を受けたターゲットの周りの敵をノックダウンします。
description.kr: 원거리에서 대상 주변 지역에 충격파를 날립니다. 이 공격으로 대상 주변의 적을 쓰러뜨릴 수 있습니다.

description.sp: Disparo de largo alcance que lanza una onda de choque en una zona alrededor del objetivo. Este ataque derriba a los enemigos alrededor del objetivo afectado.
description.sw: Long range shot that sends a shockwave in an area around the target. This attack knocks enemies around the affected target down.
description.th: การยิงระยะไกลที่ส่งคลื่นกระแทกไปในบริเวณเป้าหมาย การโจมตีนี้ทำให้ศัตรูรอบ ๆ เป้าหมายล้มลง

description.vi: Bắn tầm xa gửi sóng xung kích trong một khu vực xung quanh mục tiêu. Đòn tấn công này hạ gục kẻ thù xung quanh mục tiêu bị ảnh hưởng.

description.en: The target will block the next incoming hit no matter what.
description.ar: The target will block the next incoming hit no matter what.
description.br: O alvo irá bloquear o próximo ataque que receber, sem exceções.
description.cn: 目标玩家将格挡下一次受到的任意攻击。
description.cns: 目标玩家将格挡下一次受到的任意攻击。
description.de: Das Ziel wird den nächsten Treffer auf jeden Fall blocken.

description.fr: La cible bloquera le prochain coup reçu, quel qu'il soit.

description.jp: ターゲットは、何があっても次のインカミングヒットをブロックします。
